remarks: An involution of the divisors of a number.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 12-Sep-2015.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 13-May-2016.)
statement:
dvdsflip.a $e |- A = { x e. NN | x || N } $.
dvdsflip.f $e |- F = ( y e. A |-> ( N / y ) ) $.
dvdsflip $p |- ( N e. NN -> F : A -1-1-onto-> A ) $.
$d A y $.
$d N x y $.
